send_to_cs: Send to CS for post-purchase issues
Send to CS for shipping delays, don't ask the cx to contact the carrier themselves
Send to CS if cx reach out with a pro-deal discount or a discount given to them by their company
escalate: ESC to confirm accurate product measurements for the cx
ESC immediately if the cx mentions the code EMPLOYEE50
promo_and_exclusions: Codes can't be applied to bundles
Codes can be applied on sale items but are not valid during sitewide sales
SuperCircle Credits can be used at any time on any items (regular, discounted/on sale) and even during sitewide sales
SuperCircle Credits can NOT be combined with another discount code at the same time

Template used: "Shipping time"; last updated: 2024-08-06 22:52:55.518

tentree: Thanks for getting in touch! We do our best to ship all orders within 1-2 business days of the order being placed, but we may need up to 5 business days to prep and ship your order during very busy periods. Once your order has shipped, standard delivery will typically take 7-10 business days, express delivery will take 3-5 business days, and international deliveries can take up to 4 weeks. May I know what item you are interested in?

Steve Madden: Hello, I'm so sorry to hear that. To be sure, are you referring to Order #10872689? Rest assured, it's currently under processing. Most orders are shipped within 2 business days after they are placed, unless the items are pre-ordered or backordered. We typically ship via FedEx, and once shipped, delivery will take 3-7 business days domestically. You'll receive tracking info via email as soon as your order is ready and shipped. I appreciate your patience!
